content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) which is currently set to work with copper ore.

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5) connected to the power network.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown) which is currently without power.

### Copper plate mine
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) which is currently set to work with copper ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when setting furnace recipe
- Ensure that the furnace is placed correctly and is not obstructed by other entities before attempting to set its recipe.

### Errors when ensuring power supply
- Check the power connections of the assembling machine to ensure it is connected to the power network before attempting to use it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
